        public java.lang.String getValue()
        Return the field value of this MAR field. Mostly used for control fields, but also on formats that do not use subfields.
        Returns:

        Search for fields that match a pattern.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • toTagKey

        public java.lang.String toTagKey()
        A MARC field can be denoted by a key, independent of values. This key is a string, consisting of the tag.
        Returns:
        the tag-based key of this MARC field

      • toTagIndicatorKey

        public java.lang.String toTagIndicatorKey()
        A MARC field can be denoted by a key, independent of values. This key is a string, consisting of tag and indicator delimited by a dollar sign.
        Returns:
        the tag/indicator-based key of this MARC field

      • getSubfieldIds

        public java.lang.String getSubfieldIds()
        Return subfield IDs.
        Returns:
        the subfield ID list as a string.

      • toKey

        public java.lang.String toKey()
        A MARC field can be denoted by a key, independent of values. This key is a string, consisting of tag, indicator, subfield IDs, delimited by a dollar sign.
        Returns:
        the key of this MARC field
